snippet: Amid an escalating war in a conservative culture, the unlikely stars on an Afghan singing competition face life-threatening risks and societal pressures....

headline.main: A Rapping Barber, a Defiant Teenager and a Release for War-Weary Afghans

lead_paragraph: Amid an escalating war in a conservative culture, the unlikely stars on an Afghan singing competition face life-threatening risks and societal pressures.
